law.catch_line: Facsimile Signatures Of City Clerk Or Assistant City Clerk
law.text: A facsimile of the signature of a city clerk or of a duly appointed assistant city clerk, imprinted by either of them upon any original instrument in attestation of the fact that the said instrument has been recorded in the city clerkâ€™s office, shall have the same validity as the written signature of either of them.
